steps.title: Requirements analysis
steps.description: Gather and document all business requirements for the new ERP system

steps.title: Vendor selection
steps.description: Evaluate potential ERP solutions and select final vendor

steps.title: Data mapping
steps.description: Create schema for migrating data from legacy system to new ERP

steps.title: Test environment setup
steps.description: Set up development and test environments for the new system

steps.title: User acceptance testing
steps.description: Conduct UAT with key stakeholders from each department

steps.title: Go-live preparations
steps.description: Final preparations for system cutover and go-live

steps.title: Network infrastructure scanning
steps.description: Perform comprehensive scan of all network devices

steps.title: Vulnerability assessment
steps.description: Analyze scan results and identify security vulnerabilities

steps.title: Critical vulnerability remediation
steps.description: Address high and critical security findings

steps.title: Security policy updates
steps.description: Update network security policies based on findings

steps.title: Final report preparation
steps.description: Prepare final audit report for management

steps.title: Cloud provider selection
steps.description: Evaluate cloud providers and select the best solution

steps.title: Architecture design
steps.description: Design cloud architecture for initial applications

steps.title: Network setup
steps.description: Configure VPCs, subnets, and security groups

steps.title: Identity & access management
steps.description: Set up IAM policies and roles

steps.title: Migration of test workloads
steps.description: Migrate initial non-critical applications

steps.title: Documentation
steps.description: Document phase 1 infrastructure and processes

steps.title: Requirements gathering
steps.description: Collect requirements from helpdesk team and users

steps.title: System customization
steps.description: Customize the system to match company workflows

steps.title: System evaluation
steps.description: Evaluate available helpdesk solutions

steps.title: Data migration
steps.description: Migrate existing tickets and knowledge base

steps.title: User training
steps.description: Train helpdesk staff on new system

steps.title: Go-live
steps.description: Launch new helpdesk system

steps.title: Hardware inventory
steps.description: Audit all workstations for Windows 11 compatibility

steps.title: Image creation
steps.description: Create and test standard Windows 11 image

steps.title: Application compatibility testing
steps.description: Test all business applications on Windows 11

steps.title: Pilot deployment
steps.description: Deploy to management team for initial feedback

steps.title: Department rollout
steps.description: Roll out to departments in planned phases

steps.title: Post-deployment support
steps.description: Provide dedicated support for initial weeks after rollout
